basics.name: Sevi Melvin
basics.summary: Final-year Master of Research student in the Mathematics, Vision, Apprentissage (MVA) program at ENS Paris-Saclay, focusing on Generative AI, Diffusion Models, and Large Language Models.

projects.title: Text-to-Image generation control with IP-Adapter
projects.description: Contribution to the development of the IP-Adapter model for text-to-image generation, enhancing its creative capabilities.

projects.title: Refining image segmentation through diffusion models
projects.description: Exploring the use of diffusion models for refining image segmentation tasks.

projects.title: Data challenge for sketch drawings images classification
projects.description: Fine-tuning a pre-trained ViT transformer for classifying sketch drawing images.

projects.title: Graph Neural Networks Benchmarking Paper Review
projects.description: Thorough review of the 'Benchmarking Graph Neural Networks' paper by Dwivedi et al.

projects.title: Numerical Probabilities and Computational Statistics
projects.description: Implementation of the Expectation-Maximization (EM) algorithm for parameter estimation in Hidden Markov Models.

projects.title: Graph Motif Detection Project
projects.description: Development of efficient computational algorithms to detect subgraph structures in large graphs.
